definitions.definition: to move at a speed faster than a walk
feeling or showing pleasure or contentment
of a color intermediate between green and violet
a written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together
to say something in order to convey information
of considerable or relatively great size
of a size that is less than normal or usual
to mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface
a thought or suggestion as to a possible course of action
